name: TheStarMalaysia
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get the top headlines and news you need to know, updated on a daily basis. Stay informed on current issues, business, sport, lifestyle and more from The Star, Malaysia’s leading English news source.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
